channel.title: Public Speaking on Raph's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Public Speaking on Raph's Blog

item.title: My first time speaking at a conference
item.description:
Since time immemorial we humans have valued the art of public speaking. Today, I want to share with you my experiences in speaking at conferences for the first time. Recently, I spoke at both DDD Melbourne and DDD Perth. Both of which were positive experiences that I learnt a lot in.
source: Wikipedia So you may have been speaking at MeetUps, internal company events and/or Toastmasters and feel it’s time to graduate to a full conference.
